attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the current government
attributes.additional_details: We call on you as leader of the largest party in opposition, Mr Corbyn, to push for this motion to be considered in the House of Commons.
attributes.background:
Under the Fixed-Term Parliaments act, early general elections may only be called if the Commons votes on the following motion:

“That this House has no confidence in Her Majesty’s Government.”

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221912
